name: Plasma Planet Blaster
description:
Plasma Planet Blaster is game taking place in beautifull planet environnements where you have to connect 3 or more of same color plasma. Once matched, these plasmas disappeared. 

If plasma colors dont match correctly they will pill up until top of screen. Top of screen meaning Game Over!
Served by a super sound ambiance and graphics, Plasma Planet Blaster proposes 99 levels increasingly difficult graranting hours of fun.

Have fun!
